function.description:
Read text from a plain text file.
If the input parameter is a stream the stream will be consumed as text. Otherwise the input is treated as a file path. Character encoding can be set manually, using a string identifying the format. By default, i.e. without specifying any encoding type, de getText function will use the system encoding.
